about_the_game:
Escape from Darkness is a single player, first person survival horror game. After waking up alone in a strange, eerie place. You must plunge into the oppressive darkness ignorant of what awaits. Use stealth to avoid danger, but don't play it too safe. You will also need to investigate your surroundings and find resources to fight the horrors that lurk in the gloom around you. Persevere, and make your way out alive in this horrifying experience. Are you brave enough to Escape from the Darkness?

Oppressive

Awaken to a world shrouded in shadow, your memory a blank slate. With every heartbeat, navigate the sinister confines of a cultist farm, a place where danger lurks and the next victim could be you. Your only hope is to outwit the pervasive darkness that seeks to consume you. Stealth is your ally; resources are scarce and fraught with peril.

Eldritch abominations are an ever-present threat and will stop at nothing until you join their family. Quick wits, methodical gameplay, and a little bit of luck are your weapons against the darkness. Do not fail.



Escape from Darkness

Navigate the treacherous pathways of a cultist stronghold, where every decision could mean freedom or demise. Confront the questions that haunt your every step: How did you arrive in this place of despair? What sinister motives drive the cultists’ actions? And what are the mysterious dark forces that permeate your surroundings? Your survival hinges on your ability to probe, deduce, and outsmart the lurking dangers. Forge your path to liberation or die trying.


Features
  • Immersive Stealth Gameplay
  • Physics based interactions with the world.
  • Scavenge for limited resources
  • Explorable semi-open world
  • Oppressive mood and atmosphere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
